title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.13 - Use of forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.13 - Use of forms

State Regulations
A bail agent shall not use any contract or form that the insurer that issues the bail bond has not submitted to, and received approval from, the superintendent pursuant to section
66.1
of this Title (Insurance Regulation 76). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
28.13

Adopted

New

York State Register November 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 47, eff. 3/19/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
